name: Night at the Zoo
description:
Description

Play as a starving homeless guy in the night zoo!

The visitors are already gone, most of the animals have been asleep and everything is immersed in the moonlight. But you can not enjoy this poetic scenery, as you could die from starvation at any moment!

Search for the coins lying on the ground, sneak around the watchmen and eat whatever you can to survive until you reach your goal. The last baguette in the vending machine.

Instructions
  • Don't get too close to the watchmen or they will see or hear you. You can also hide from them inside the bushes. 
  • Eat food from trash cans or animal cages.
  • Collect 10 coins and reach the vending machine before you starve to death.
Controls

WASD - move

Space - interaction
